metadata.Title: CVE-2012-3357 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The SVN revision view (lib/vclib/svn/svn_repos.py) in ViewVC before 1.1.15does not properly handle log messages when a readable path is copied froman unreadable path, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation, related to a "log msg leak."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3357` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

viewvc - 1.1.22-1
viewvc-query - 1.1.22-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: viewvc package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.22-1').
